# Mobile Automation Skill (English)
Contains Android/iOS (Appium) knowledge for this project.

## Focus
- Device/emulator lifecycle, Appium driver installation, and caps tuning.
- Recording environment variables, SDK paths, and timeouts for reliability.

## Support members
- Mobile DevOps (sets up emulators, handles SDK updates)
- Device Stability Monitor (captures adb/logcat issues)
- Localization Tester (validates JP/EN instructions on actual devices)

## How to use
1. Consult the English version first when facing Appium or emulator issues.
2. Japanese edition explains platform-specific details and hints for local environments.
3. After fixing mobile problems, log the steps in `docs/Knowledge.md`.

## Notes
- Also see `../mobile_skill.md` for the consolidated overview.
